name: Major Volume Plumping Lip Gloss
about: What it is:..Formulation Type:...Benefits:..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Peppermint: Stimulates blood-flow to the lips for an instant plumping effect...Ingredient Callouts:...What Else You Need to Know:
ingredients: -Vitamin E: Enhances shine and adds moisture to the lips..-Peppermint: Stimulates bloodflow to the lips for a quick plumping effect..-Jojoba Oil: Smooths and restores hydration and moisture to the lips...Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tocopheryl Nicotinate, Menthyl Ethylamido Oxalate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, .Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Isostearic Acid, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Alcohol, Hydroxymethoxyphenyl Propylmethylmethoxybenzofuran, Caprylyl Glycol, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, 1,2-Hexanediol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Water (Aqua, Eau), Hydrogenated Styrene/Butadiene Copolymer, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Powder, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Flavor (Aroma), Cinnamal, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Eugenol, MayContain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 33 Lake (CI .17200), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Apply the major volume plumping gloss over your favorite shade of the precision lip crayon (sold separately) for an added pop of color...- For the ultimate color payoff, apply the major volume plumping gloss over your favorite shade of the matte .suede lipstick (sold separately).

reviews.review_title: I CANNOT RAVE ENOUGH ABOUT THIS! RUN TO GET IT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OH MY GOD. I'm sorry for all the all-caps screaming I'm about to do.... but this product deserves it!!! So I went into a Sephora looking for a clean, moisturizing, semi-sheer, not overly tinted lip gloss, and came out of the store with this doing a happy dance NOT EVEN KIDDING. First of all the color (2 CC's) is absolutely GORGEOUS. It's a pinky, nude, peachish color. It's so beautiful and flattering. Online it looks more peachy than actually is, but it's the most gorgeous lip gloss shade ever. Second of all, it's soooooo moisturizing. It makes my lips soooo soft!!! Thirdly, it's PLUMPING. And not in a flubbery fish lip type of way, or in a burn-your-lips-off way. It has a super gentle tingle that reminds me that it's doing its job and making my lips look amazing!! I know some people are saying that it burns their lips: it definitely doesn't burn mine. All there is the slightest tingle! Fourthly (ik that's not at thing but idc), THE SMELL. It has an unusual smell but in like an AMAZING WAY. It smells like ginger in a super subtle, slightly spicy, slightly juicy fruity way. It's so addicting!!! Fifthly (yes im on a roll now lol), THE APPLICATION. The applicator gets just the right amount of product on it! And it feels thick and glossy on your lips, but not overly so, and it's not sticky. Sixthly, it makes me feel bougie and expensive and special. And we all deserve to feel that way!!! If you've even made it to the end with the amount of things I've said, I HOPE THAT YOU BUY THIS. BECAUSE I PLAN ON USING THIS FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE: EVERYDAY, EVERY MOMENT. IM OBSESSED.

reviews.review_title: THE HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT YOUR LIPS NEED
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love this product! I love how especially off the bat the outer product packaging isn't deceiving, the lip gloss fit perfectly snug in its packaging. The product itself is beautiful, wearable and compact - it fits perfectly in my daily makeup bag, which is definitely a win for me as I know I'll be using it often. Unlike most lip glosses, the formal isn't tight or sticky - the gloss glides on the lips and you are then instantly met with the cool plumping effects. I also love how the plumping effect isn't too overbearing, and is comfortable enough to wear. I think this shade is also perfect for everyone! It being clear makes it extremely versatile, as I can wear it alone for a more natural look or use it to top off one of my favorite lipsticks. Altogether, this was definitely one of those hidden holy grail products that I didn't know I needed. I may have to try every color now.

reviews.review_text: I initially tried PT original glosses and did not enjoy the shimmer due to how they felt on the lips. However this formula the shimmer is very fine and not gritty. It has an interesting smell and the best way to describe it is holiday time at Michaels. It has a mix between the cinnamon and the peppermint so they feel very light on the lips, not too cooling or warming (thinking of gloss bomb heat, much less). It is not my favorite smell but as someone who is scent sensitive it has not deterred me, they are super shiny. I picked up 3 shades during the last sale, and i would say they are on the sheer side (which i prefer) but pouty and superficial are very similar on the lips in case you are only trying to choose one. The doefoot on these is also larger than his original glosses which i like because it's easier to not have to dip in several times. These glosses are also pretty large in terms of the amount of product you are getting, double the size of an average gloss.
